preparePropertyAccess

protected void preparePropertyAccess()
Resolve the getter and setter methods for the field. Uses standard Bean conventions the setter is "set" + ObjectName todo jjs "is" and "get" are acceptable variants for boolean The getter is "get" + ObjectName (first letter uppercase) and "is" + ObjectName (first letter uppsercase) for booleans Complains if there is not both a setter and a getter, but this might be an immutable bean with only getters.

Parameters:
throwException -
